TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit UnicodeRange extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Represents a contiguous range of Unicode code points.

remarks.format:
## Remarks
使用靜態<xref:System.Text.Unicode.UnicodeRange.Create%2A>方法或<xref:System.Text.Unicode.UnicodeRange.%23ctor%2A>建構函式建立任意的 Unicode 字碼指標。 您使用的靜態屬性<xref:System.Text.Unicode.UnicodeRanges>類別來擷取<xref:System.Text.Unicode.UnicodeRange>執行個體，其中包含以 unicode 的字碼指標的具名範圍。
目前，<xref:System.Text.Unicode.UnicodeRange>類別支援僅基本多國語言平面 (BMP)，其延伸了從 U + 0000 到 U + FFFF。

MemberSignature.Value: public UnicodeRange (int firstCodePoint, int length);
.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(int32 firstCodePoint, int32 length) cil managed
Public Sub New (firstCodePoint As Integer, length As Integer)
public: UnicodeRange(int firstCodePoint, int length);
new System.Text.Unicode.UnicodeRange : int * int -> System.Text.Unicode.UnicodeRange

Docs.param: The first code point in the range.
The number of code points in the range.
Docs.summary: Creates a new that includes a specified number of characters starting at a specified Unicode code point.

remarks.format:
## Remarks
任何未定義的字碼元素之間`firstCodePoint`和`firstCodePoint` + `length` -1 隨附的<xref:System.Text.Unicode.UnicodeRange>藉由呼叫這個建構函式建立的執行個體。

Docs.exception:
is less than zero or greater than 0xFFFF. -or- is less than zero.
-or- plus is greater than 0xFFFF.
